useCase.name: View Digital Archive Items

preconditions.precondition: Researcher has access to the digital archive system

successEndConditions.condition: Researcher successfully views digital archive item details

useCase.trigger: Researcher wants to access and view digital archive items

mainSequence.step: Researcher accesses digital archive through Web Interface
Researcher requests to view a specific item
Search Service queries the digital archive for item metadata
Database returns metadata, including the digitization date of the item
Search Service displays item details to Web Interface
Web Interface shows Researcher item details, including the digitization date
